title: Loading Screen Never Popping Up
body: Everything works fine up until the timer runs out in champ select. When champ select ends, the loading screen never pops up anymore. I tried reinstalling and it still hasn't resolved the issue. I lost LP from this and it's getting really frustrating. Please someone help!

replies.body:
When the loading screen doesn't show, it's generally an indication that your client cannot establish a proper connection to the game server. Common causes include both local network settings and ISP routing issues. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a good place to start in finding a long-term solution.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after taking those steps.
